parameters.name: JobType
parameters.description:
The type of the deployment task.

Valid values:

*   cloud: multi-cloud deployment task.
*   user: cloud service deployment task. This type of task does not support Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances.

parameters.name: ShowSize
parameters.description: The number of certificates per page. Default value: **50**.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the deployment task.

Valid values:

*   success
*   pending
*   scheduling
*   processing
*   error
*   editing
